welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Achern, Germany! This charming city is known for its picturesque landscapes, rich history, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Achern has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Entzheim Airport, handling both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines and some charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Black Forest Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Black Forest Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
